comment: Tastes after Bushmills21, but held up: loads of vanilla and fruityness. Delicious.

(Batch 2)

Sweet apple and apricot up front, a little acerbic.  It mellows into a light taste of tea with clove and oak on the finish.  It retains a sugary/fruity sweetness all the way through.  It’s quite a nice dram which reminds me of Bushmills (in a good way!)
